code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Login from'./components/Login';import CreateUser from'./components/CreateUser';import PoliceAddForm from'./components/PoliceAddForm';import PoliceSearchForm from'./components/PoliceSearchForm';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[token,setToken]=useState(localStorage.getItem('token')||'');const[username,setUsername]=useState(localStorage.getItem('username')||'');useEffect(()=>{localStorage.setItem('token',token);localStorage.setItem('username',username);},[token,username]);const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('username');setToken('');setUsername('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-4",children:!token?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{setToken:setToken,setUsername:setUsername}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"text-xl mb-4",children:["Bienvenido, ",username]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-red-500 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded mb-4",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Cerrar sesi\xF3n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PoliceAddForm,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PoliceSearchForm,{token:token,currentUser:username}),username==='GustavoPeralta'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateUser,{token:token,currentUser:username})]})});}export default App;
